explanation: [0-0] A young woman is sitting on a bench by the sidewalk, completely engrossed in the mobile phone in her hand. She's wearing a white top and green shorts, a pair of white sunglasses on her head, and there's a coffee cup next to her.

[0-7] A man wearing a blue shirt, grey shorts, and a black cap walks towards her. After reaching her side, he gently taps her shoulder with his hand. The woman turns her head to look at the man, and the man points his finger at the coffee cup beside her. Then the man picks up the coffee cup, opens the lid, and holds it up in front of the woman to get her attention. It can be seen that the coffee cup is full of coffee. Then the man puts his left hand over the coffee cup, completely covering the coffee inside.
